name: serverok
description: Serve your files/folder locally or over a network

scripts.build: tsc && ncp src/views dist/lib/src/views && npm link
scripts.dev:serve: nodemon --ignore "dist/**/*" --ext ".js,.ts,.json,.css,.ejs" --exec "npm run build && serverok serve . || exit 1"
scripts.dev:auth: nodemon --ignore "dist/**/*" --ext ".js,.ts,.json,.css,.ejs" --exec "npm run build && serverok auth || exit 1"
